Examples
========

This section contains a series of examples that demonstrate how to use the
:mod:`verus` package. The examples are divided into the following categories:

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   extract_poi_example
   clustering_example  
   vulnerability_index_example

These examples are not extensive (i.e., they do not demonstrate the full potential of the module), and are intended to provide an overview of the functionality of the
:mod:`verus` package. For more detailed information, please refer to the
documentation of the individual modules and classes.
